text: Voglia di vivere (Desire for life) is a 1990 Italian drama television film directed by Lodovico Gasparini. It is based on real life events of Augusto and Michaela Odone and their son Lorenzo Odone. The same events inspired the 1992 film Lorenzo's Oil.
